001package gbw.melange.common.shading.generative.checker;
002
003import gbw.melange.common.shading.generative.IGenerativeShader;
004
005public interface ICheckerShader extends IGenerativeShader<ICheckerShader> {
006
007    /**
008     * Set the amount of columns shown. Partial (non-integer) values show the last row as being "cut-off" allowing for smooth animations.
009     */
010    void setColumns(double count);
011    /**
012     * Set the amount of rows shown. Partial (non-integer) values show the last row as being "cut-off" allowing for smooth animations.
013     */
014    void setRows(double count);
015
016}
